result.title: Approaches to Solve 608B Hamming Distance Sum
result.content:
Hello fellows,

First, congrats ! You all did well on the contest. In this first blog we want to think about approaches to solve Problem 608B. Hamming Distance Sum. No body managed to solve it during the contest but we had some submissions. First make sure that you understand what the problem is asking and then think about approaches to solve this problem: what's the brute force solution ? Are there any observations that you can make ? etc..

Try to resist opening the editorial and posting what's in there..

You can contribute by posting questions, approaches, etc..
